articles.description: Railway stocks witnessed some profit booking after a sharp surge this year. Barring IRCTC, stocks like Railtel, RVNL, IRCON and IRFC have gained anywhere between 80-150 percent this year.

articles.author: Anshul
articles.title: New TCS rules from October 1: Know rates on international trips, card payments, investments, others - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The new TCS rules, effective from October 1, 2023, will impact various financial transactions related to overseas expenses, investments, and education. It's essential to be aware of these rules to ensure compliance with tax regulations and plan your financial…

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: UPL rises 3.5% as brokerage upgrades stock to 'buy' - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Antique Stock Broking has revised its rating on UPL to a Buy due to stabilizing of product price and receding channel inventory.
articles.content: Shares of UPL were trading 3.5 percent higher on the NSE at 11 am on September 14, after brokerages revised the rating to "Buy". The stock opened at Rs 615.55, up by 1.2 percent from close on Septemb… [+1372 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: United Spirits sees marginal gains, receives VAT, CST assessment notice - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In a regulatory filing, United Spirits said that the tax authority has denied the input tax credit taken by the company on ENA (extra neutral alcohol) purchased.
articles.content: Shares of United Spirits were trading 0.5 percent higher at open on the NSE on September 14, a day after the company announced it has received VAT & CST assessment orders for FY21, totaling a dem… [+1989 chars]

articles.author: Sunil Shankar Matkar
articles.title: Trade Spotlight | What should you do with Punjab National Bank, Aarti Industries, ITI today? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: ITI formed robust bullish candlestick pattern on the daily timeframe with strong volumes on Wednesday. The stock gained more than 60 percent during the current week.
articles.content: Bulls seem to have charged up after a day of consolidation, pushing the market beyond the 20,000 mark on the Nifty, at close on September 13. This rally was backed by banks. The index can march towar… [+3494 chars]
